mapper.select: SELECT RESATT_NO, RESATT_ORIGINALNM, RESATT_SAVENAME, RESATT_FILESIZE, RESATT_MIME, RESUME_TITLE FROM RESUME_ATTATCH WHERE RESATT_NO = #{resattNo}
SELECT RCRT_NO, RPROC_ORDER, SCR_EDU, SCR_LANG, SCR_CAREER, SCR_CER, SCR_IA, SCR_OS, SCR_ETC FROM RESUME_FORM WHERE RCRT_NO = #{rcrtNo} AND RPROC_ORDER = #{rprocOrder}
SELECT rcrt_no, rproc_order, apl_no, scr_edu, scr_lang, scr_career, scr_cer, scr_ia, scr_os, scr_etc FROM resume_score WHERE rcrt_no=#{rcrtNo} and rproc_order=#{rprocOrder} and apl_no=#{aplNo}
